## Basic Syntax and some hotkeys
```{r}
my_string <- "comment me with ctrl-shift-c"
print(my_string)

7 # execute this line with ctrl-enter
#hotkey for assignments is "alt" + "-"

x <- 1
2 -> y
z = x + y
# Run the whole chunk with ctrl-shift-enter
```
